title: Are people outside PES allowed for maaya concert?
content: I know this question was asked recently and the answer was no , but what does the 'non pes  students ' section mean then?

comments.body: what is wrong with you? Did'nt you read the flyer?
Why bother reading officially communicated information when you can make the same reddit post for the third time in a row and farm karma? /s
No wonder why you guys hate thia batch smh
